skillTree.name: Sadistic
skillTree.description: There is great pleasure to be derived from the humiliation and suffering of others; this one has felt and revelled in it.

skillTree.name: Eternal Hatred
skillTree.description: The strength of this warrior's attack never wavers for an instance, such is the opprobrium felt for their hated High Elf cousins.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves

skillTree.name: Ward of Khaine
skillTree.description: The Bloody-handed God watches over his disciples.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hekarti
skillTree.description: Magic's dark mistress has a care for her dutiful acolytes.

skillTree.name: Ruthless
skillTree.description: Kouran cares nothing for the lives of other mortals, save the Witch King and Morathi, and has been known to sacrifice entire armies to defend the Dark Elf realm.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2

Enemy leadership: -5
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.name: Warrior Elite
skillTree.description: Kouran has extensively studied the use of both sword and halberd from the finest weapon masters in Naggaroth, many of whom perished during the tutelage.

skillTree.name: Lords of Oblivion
skillTree.description: All fear his wrath and, under his merciless leadership, the army of Naggarond has crushed every foe it has faced with him at its head.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Black Guard of Naggarond units
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Black Guard of Naggarond units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Encourage for Black Guard of Naggarond units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Eternal Enemy
skillTree.description: Deep is Kouran's loathing for the ancient enemy, he has personally lead many attacks against them and will gladly do it again and again..

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Frenzy" when fighting against High Elves
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: The Right Hand of Darkness
skillTree.description: Kouran is that rarest of things in a land steeped in treachery is an honest soul, a warrior utterly loyal to the Witch King.

effects.description: On turn start, Lords have a chance to gain 1 loyalty
Passive ability: "Captain of the Black Guard"

ui_effects.description: Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker

effects.description:
Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Black Guard of Naggarond units (minimum 1) in this province
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Dance of Death
skillTree.description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Conviction
skillTree.description: Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Tenacity
skillTree.description: This one will not go down easily - it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Increase Mobility
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Malekith's Right Hand
backgroundSkills.description: Kouran Darkhand is the longest-serving member of Malekith's personal army, having fought at the Witch King's side for nearly a thousand years.

effects.description: Leadership: +25 and Melee Attack +5 for Kouran Darkhand when embedded into Malekith's army.

Recruit rank: +2 for Black Guard of Naggarond units
	(Hero's army)

items.name: The Armour of Grief
items.description: This enchanted armour was first worn by Arnaethron, one of the Witch King's first lietenants during the Sundering. Those that attempt to strike the wearer must first overcome an aura of paralysing pain.

effects.description: Attribute: Causes Fear for Black Guard of Naggarond units

items.name: Crimson Death
items.description: This halberd was carried by Lord Khalak of Ghrond, the first Captain of the Black Guard. It has been passed down to every successor since.
